alert.note: Alert for Grant (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 5:16PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cleveland and southern Grant Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 516 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lamont, or 9 miles northwest of Rison, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rison... Toledo... Kedron... Calmer... Staves... Mt Zion... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
